post:
LET,

I have a fleet of new servers racked and ready to go in Buffalo, so here is the deal for you guys to eat up. There is no limit to how many you can order and the price you see is what you get!

All plans include 4 CPU Cores. UGVPS is now setting up new servers with more powerful setups. These VPS will be setup on brand new nodes that have SSD Caching for awesome I/O speeds!! Have a peak at our ServerBear benchmarks at http://serverbear.com/10144/ugvps

**Buffalo, New York:**

- 1024MB Guaranteed RAM
- 1536MB Burstable RAM
- 40GB Disk Space
- 1000GB Monthly Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- OpenVZ/SolusVM

$19/year forever price - equivalent to $1.58/mo.
Order: https://www.ugvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=103

**First 5** people to reply with their order ID will receive DOUBLE the HDD, DOUBLE the bandwidth, and DOUBLE the IPs! Thats a 1GB VPS with 80GB disk, 2TB bandwidth, with 2 IPs for just $19/year!!!

--

Our other promotion is still good for all locations.  (Chicago, Atlanta, Buffalo, and Los Angeles)

- 2048MB Guaranteed RAM
- 2560MB Burstable RAM
- 60GB Disk Space
- 2000GB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 address
- OpenVZ/SolusVM

6.00/month or $19.00/6 months.
Order: https://www.ugvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=99
